h2_title: The Webbed Hollow Celestial Jade Lotus Pill
content: The Celestial Jade Lotus Pill of Chapter 4 can be found just opposite the giant hole leading down into the Webbed Hollow from the Estate of Zhu. It's sitting on a table in front of a large stone circle.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Jade_Lotus_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Jade Lotus Pill Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow Celestial Jade Lotus Pill'.
The content is as follows:
The Celestial Jade Lotus Pill of Chapter 4 can be found just opposite the giant hole leading down into the Webbed Hollow from the Estate of Zhu. It's sitting on a table in front of a large stone circle.
